description:
While helping out a kind granny in a nearby village, the little fox is captivated by the tale of a fox who saves his beloved by grabbing an Oni by the horns! Believing the story to be true, the little guy returns to Tomobiki Town to save Shinobu!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blind Love! You Bet Your Life, Honest Fox
恋ひとすじ! 命かけます純情キツネ!!
